attributes.action: Take resposibility for the death of Farmers Wife
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Through Years of Gordon Browns control of the economy as Chancellor and now Prime Minister, he has solely taken the responsibility or increasing Tax and duty on Petrol and Diesel, way above any other country.
Now in these sad times we now have the terrible news that farmers wife Rosemary Dove Dies after Theft of Diesel from her farm, leaving her Son critically ill in hospital.
Gordon Brown Must take responsibility and decrease the amount of duty, making Diesel a less viable commodity to be stolen, and help preserve life.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
